markdownRemark.html: Academy of Flamenco, ballet and modern dances. Centro de Baile Jerez (CBJ) is an academy aimed at anyone who wants to learn and develop their knowledge of flamenco dance, reaching the highest levels in its various disciplines.

frontmatter.title: Centro de Baile Jerez

frontmatter.address: Calle Velazquez, 24,11407 Jerez de la Frontera.
